overview:
Avinash has 6+ years of industry experience. He has recently cofounded Earth Solutions Pvt. Ltd, Pune. He is currently serving as Director.

Prior joining this venture, Avinash worked with GS Lab for 4 years. Avinash has extensive Telecom background and has worked for Clients Veraz Networks, Piano Networks and OOMA. Avinash mainly worked on Telecom Protocols likeSS7-ISUP, PRI. He had been active member of Global Product Delivery Team for Major Customers for Veraz Networks.

Avinash also has worked for Bay Area Based Client - Rohati Systems, where he contributed in building Testing Framework for the Rohati Appliance. He was also responsible for CIFS proxy implementation for Rohati Appliance.

Prior to GS Lab, Avinash worked for Pune based company â€“ Netsurf Communications. Avinash worked on SIP-VoIP application development. He handled porting of G729 codec support within SIPXTapi Library.

Before joining Netsurf Communications, Avinash worked with LivetekSolutions, Pune. Avinash worked on e-Commerce Solutions for various clients.

Avinash holds a B.E. in Computer Science from Pune University, India.
